name: Am Eschenbichl
description:
As local residents who are well bonded to Mayrhofen we are determined to provide make your holidays in our beautiful Zillertal unforgettable.
The holiday region of Mayrhofen / Hippach is one of four tourism regions in the Zillertal Valley and can probably be seen as a vibrant center of the valley.
Enjoy your winter holiday in Austria with skiing or snowboarding in one of the largest skiing areas or enjoy winter hiking on the cleared trails and cross-country skiing in glorious sunshine in the beautiful surroundings of the Zillertal.
Unique views from the terraces of the mountain huts and restaurants in the ski resorts are not the only way for the wide views across the Zillertal Alps. When Paragliding directly form the mountain you will see the region around Mayrhofen from a whole new perspective.
Mayrhofen in summer is also spectacular. In the Adlerbühne at the Ahorn mountain you will discover spectacular bird demonstrations. There are also rope routes for mountaineers and trails to explore for mountain bikers.
Unlimited freedom, pure lust for life and just being human - it can be so beautiful.
Children in the bed of the parents are free of charge;
Short-stay rate 1-3 nights € 10,- per person and stay
At your arrival you will get a basic equipement for a breakfast:
milk, coffee cream, 2 Nespresso coffee capsule, teebags, sugar, 1 portion butter and jam, 1 roll per person
..and of course fresh and clear spring water from our mountains!

image.caption: Am Eschenbichl Mayrhofen - Ahorn Schlafzimmer Nr.2
Am Eschenbichl Mayrhofen - Ahorn Badezimmer Nr.2

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower and bath tub, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
Next to our standard equipment (free W-Lan, safe, cable TV with flat HD TVs in all rooms, Neppers coffeemaker, kettle, microwave, ceran cooking plate, dishwasher, fridge and freezer, fume hood, glasses, cutlery, dishes, bedclothes, towels - to be changed twice a week), the apartment "Ahorn" offers following layout:
- 2 double rooms 
- Big open kitchen/living room with seating area 
- Master bathroom: bathtub with starlight ceiling, shower cabin, double washbasin, bidet, towel dryer, flat TV, toilet separated 
- 2nd bathroom with bathtub, washbasin, toilet 
- Infrared cabin (2-3 seats) 
- Generous corridor with wardrobe 
- 2 balconies
If necessary, the apartments can be joined together!

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description:
Next to our standard equipment (free W-Lan, safe, cable TV with flat HD TVs in all rooms, Neppers coffeemaker, kettle, microwave, ceran cooking plate, dishwasher, fridge and freezer, fume hood, glasses, cutlery, dishes, bedclothes, towels - to be changed twice a week), the apartment "Penken" offers following layout:
- 1 double room 
- Open kitchen/living room with pull-out couch for 2 persons 
- Shower with washbasin and toilet 
- Small anteroom with wardrobe 
- Balcony
If necessary, the apartments can be joined together!

3-4 pax on request
